headline: 3M Company (MMM) Targets 25% Margin Expansion, Launches 1,000 New Products by 2028
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Most Undervalued Dow Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. 3M Company is one of them. 3M Company (NYSE:MMM), a diversified industrial giant known for its innovations in healthcare, safety, and industrial products, is being recognized by analysts as one of the most undervalued Dow stocks heading into […]
